data.title: Much Better Experience than TOOC a block down thee street
data.text: So we stopped in both TOOC and Villa Di Calabro to taste their olive oils.  Villa Di Calabro's owner spent lots of time explaining his creations in oil and vinegar with tremendous passion. (The associate at TOOC seemed bored that we were there, gave us four tastings and explained nothing.)  This is the Olive Oil outlet that you want to visit; don't waste your time at TOOC.

data.title: Great way to start out a Temecula trip
data.text:
We drove from Laguna on a Wednesday.... had made some quick TA notes
but no real plan.

Parking no problem during during the week. We ambled around town, impressed by the sights.  Saw Villa Di Calabro and thought "how about a taste and some advice and maybe a map."

Mike is the owner manager.  6 tastes were $12.  Good pours.  Wines were very good.

Mike is proud of the area and knows the wines and viticulture.  He went over the map
and showed us routes and suggestions based on our wine tastes.  No need nor a stop at the visitor center which we never saw.  Thank's Mike!
